title: yasuo bronze champ
body: This yasuo really should get nerf,he is really to strong are you riot blnd  or what yasuo is not balanced champ.he jump like monkey on all maps ulti 100000 dmg.delete or nerf that for me bronze champ O skill and anoying  epic

replies.body: When did "nerf yasuo" threads go from serious to being mockery and memes?
Nerf Yasuo threads were ever serious?
About two years ago (and this summer, due to the ult bugs and tank shit), yes. They have slowly gotten funnier since then.
Very few of them
This belongs in Memes and Games.
people less crying more learning plz honestly
Dude I am pro player i said only what I see.yasuo is idiot champ .he need good nerf for balance DPS .

right... and you wouldn't totally call for a nerf if he was kicking your butt or anything like that right...... ;) i totally understand

sarcasm for the win.....

> sarcasm for the win.....

Well that's ironic
I dont think he meant to be hilarious.
{{item:3143}} blocks 10% crit

problem is mid laners cant rush that or they do no dmg and yas has armor pen on ult to counter if you rush first hard for mid laners to counter mid does hav {{summoner:3}} to help but its on a long cooldown and yasuo is way oppresive

>problem is mid laners cant rush that or they do no dmg

"base damages do not exist"
if you rush that you can survive but a yasuo with phantom dancer will survive everything you throw at him
[citation needed]
what are you talking about?

A citation is needed when you say stuff like "Yasuo will survive everything you throw at him". 
I killed Yasuo the most out of all the other champions this year. In total i killed him about 50 more times than he killed me. Clearly he does not survive everything you throw at him when he gets one item.

Why is this shit even upvoted lol

Edit: op, are you serious? I'm up voting anyways for the meme

omg you know how people be like "*Gives statistics and reasoning = downvoted, nerf yasuo = upvotes*"

I thought those were just a joke, but this is actual proof..
Let's nerf Teemo too while we're at it. He requires even less skill than Yasuo.
Upvote for the joke.
